channel.title: Spencer Thomas: Club Casualties Electro House Music
channel.description:
You might want to be a Club Casualty after listening to these podcasts by DJ Spencer Thomas. Things get funkier with every podcast/set/mix, with a disco/electro style. Simply the very best disco/electro/french/house music. Lots of vocals to keep your body moving. New mixes are released for download ever week.
Feel free to give me some feedback @ djspencerthomas@eventvibe.com Enjoy!
ST Blog Directory Blog Pinger

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Corrupt Histories
item.description: We all have one. ST and the Club Casualties are back once again. This week we have some great stuff in store for ya, from distorted basslines to some funky discoey electroey house. Its all good, from the new to the old and i end it with some personal favs, so get to it; download, stream etc...you know the drill featuring tracks and remixes this week from Under Construction Erick Decks and Zedd Future Frog and Ftampa Utku S Savant Scot Project and Lazy Rich The Believers and Richard Grey Itunes, Zune, Blackberry Podcasts, the ovi.com nokia app... www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas djspencerthomas@eventvibe.com

item.itunes:summary:

featuring tracks and remixes this week from Under Construction Erick Decks and Zedd Future Frog and Ftampa Utku S Savant Scot Project and Lazy Rich The Believers and Richard Grey
Itunes, Zune, Blackberry Podcasts, the ovi.com nokia app... www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas djspencerthomas@eventvibe.com

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Bang Bang, Stuck in the Game
item.description: Back into story mode this week. ST and the Club Casualties are back at it...what else would we be doing...? We have some of that healthy funky electro house for ya as always, and dont worry nu disco kids theres a couple at the end for ya including the last track which is a personal fav. This week feauturing tracks and remixes from Vankilla and Rabbit killer Alex Kidd, Fast Foot and Chris Lockley Ennovi Redroche and Barjo Marina & The Diamonds and Kat Krazy Chrizz Late and Progressive Wizards and James Egbert as usual you can find it here, itunes, zune, blackberry podcasts and pretty much most podcatchers, so enjoy and thanks for listening. ST djspencerthomas@eventvibe.com facebook.com/djspencerthomas

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Outrun....
item.description: Outrun....maybe....outgunned....ya right. ST and the Club Casualties are back this week will another issue of funk and electroness. A lotta new stuff that'll keep you motivated through your day or night. We don't flatline around here so tune in, subscribe (itunes, zune blackberry podcasts, podomatic, the ovi.com app and other podcatchers...and enjoy). This Week featuring tracks and remixes from Street Lurkin Icarus Fly and Cassy Jaxx Sugarrstarr and Sandra Huff Frederik Mooij and JELO Frederik Mooij James Egbert Skywhere Trampboat and Dirtyloud Enjoy and rock it out right.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...G Fueled Behavior
item.description: Had a couple week hiatus...my bad. But ST and the Club Casualties are back this week, with a lil longer mix than usual to make your commutes, office work or internet surfing more enjoyable. We got some new, some old and some nu disco...its just some o that ol funky disco/electro house goodness....so get on the grind and download/stream...as usual you can get it here, on itunes, zune, blackberry podcasts, most podcatchers and the ovi.com app.......... any feedback is always appreciated: djspencerthomas@eventvibe.com This Featuring tracks and remixes from: Martin Solveig and A-Track BeautauCue Electric Soulside and Monolythe Lazy Rich ft Bell Humble Tiff Lacey & Der Mystik with DJ Maxsie and Alex Speaker Kaskade and Pixl Ecotek & James Egbert Dragonette and Faustix & &ImanoS Finnebassen Surkin and Brodinski and Flaherty

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Pop Pop and Drop...
item.description: We're hittin it hard this week. Start off with some electro synth pop and get into some new funky electro house...even we (still the 'royal we') never heard before (@_@)...So get loaded and download/stream, its gonna be a good night. This week featuring tracks and remixes from Kavinksy & Lovefoxx and Dustin N guyen Ryeland Felix Cartal and Miss Palmer Sharam and Heren Moguai Gazburn and more... NEW...we're now on BLACKBERRY PODCASTS...and also be sure to get it on Itunes, Zune ,the ovi.com nokia app store, www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas , check out also www.eventvibe.com/djspencerthomas and ........thats about it Thanks for listenin...rock it out right.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Sick Fiend
item.description: Grab your suit; grab your flask, lets go. Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties bring back some funk this week. We (that's the 'royal we') have some new tracks for ya from a bunch of new artists rangin from from nu disco soundin electro house to some heavy electro. So be sure to subscribe, shit...you should even tell some friends. Catch us on podomatic.com, www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas , itunes, Zune, www.ovi.com app store or just google...have a good one and rock it out right. This week feauturing tracks and remixes from: Mord Fustang David Guetta and NEUS Buzzy Anthony Wolf and Royal K Teddyloid F.O.O.L Chris Lake and Feed Me Jorge Jaramillo, Marcos Carnaval Diego Ruiz

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Pursuit....
item.description: No hesitation, just jump in and we'll explain later. ST and the Club Casualties tear into this week with some new tracks and edits. And coming from some feedback we have some more nu disco/indie dance dabbed in the mix so be sure to check it out. You can stream it here, at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas , subscribe thru itunes, zune and the www.ovi.com app for your phone. Have a good one Featuring tracks and remixes from Tommie Sunshine and the Disco Fries Wild & Schark Hirshee and Ryan Enzed Figure of 8 and Pat Lok Duart Jansen and SpekrFreks Dabruck & Klein Moon Boots and more!

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...The Lineup...
item.description: Same ol' faces...new racket. ST and the CC are at it again this week. We have a bunch of new stuff for ya to keep you awake...nothing like some good ol insomnia to keep you on your toes. Some electro house with some nu disco sprinkled around; Be sure to download/stream it here, from Itunes, Zune, the nokia app (for you kids across seas) at the ovi.com app store and any questions/feedback etc you can shoot over to djspencerthomas@eventvibe.com This week featuring tracks and remixes from UpperMost A Virtual Friend and Neon Stereo Dr Who Minero Mihai Stroe Fatso and Rabbit Killer Mark Sixma and Pixl

This week featuring tracks and remixes from UpperMost A Virtual Friend and Neon Stereo Dr Who Minero Mihai Stroe Fatso and Rabbit Killer Mark Sixma and Pixl

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Blanks...
item.description: Whether you like it or not, when you stay up for a few days you'll get the blank stare. Just pop some sunglasses on and you're good to go. ST and the Club Casualties have a busy weekend so its a little shorter this week but we havnt skipped on the funk. We got some nudisco/indie dance again, this time to start it off, and then jump back into the electro house. As always you can subscribe on itunes, zune and the ovi.com app store....thanks for listening This week featuring tracks and remixes from: The S Joe Garston The Twelves Madeon The Crafty Filcher Sharam Jey and Lucky Date

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Shadowy People...
item.description: The disillusioned are an entertaining bunch.. ST and the Club Casualties are once again back with a worthwhile mix. We got some funky electro house with a dab of the old indie/nu disco for good measure...so sit back, or get up, or just stare at a wall as you download/stream and get your weekend started. This week featuring tracks and remixes from Yenn & Halev and Has! Disco Reason Fukkk Offf Mr Nagasaki Spekrfreks and Relentless Jean Jaques Smoothie Danger and more... Subscribe: Itunes, Zune, www.ovi.com app store ... www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas Thanks for listenin.

Thanks for listenin.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Night Out...
item.description: Youre working hard, chasin those evasive US dollars and to put it simply, some days suck; everyone needs a night out. Spencer T and the Club Casualties are mixing it up this week. We have the usual funky electro house to get you through the week and this time we're droppin in some funky electro/indie nu disco-ness and end it with some remixes of some old favs. Dont forget to subscribe through Itunes, Zune and get the app at www.ovi.com (search spencer thomas). YOu can also check ST out at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas . This week featuring tracks and remixes from: STFU Cold Blank Elevic The S Dilemn Wat Skullee Andrea Del Vescovo Guarana Project and Controverse and more Thanks for listenin.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...City Kids...
item.description: Everyones got that ambition so lets get to work. Step lightly because you'll be moving all night. Spencer T and the Club Casualties bring you some funky electro house this week with a ton of new tracks. Be sure to download the set and subscribe through itunes, zune and the www.ovi.com app for 'spencer thomas podcast'. This week featuring tracks and remixes from Anzo Chuckie Zedd and the Doors Noisestorm Insan3lik3 Feed me and Lindsay and Wolfgang Gartner Enjoy, and thanks for listening.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Imaginary Violence...
item.description: Sometimes the illusion is more effective... We're back this week after a week hiatus. Sorry for that, had some technical difficulties last week. We have some proper new joints here for you to get your house music fix. Be sure to download, stream or subscribe through itunes, zune, the ovi.com app store and any other podcatcher. Also check out ST on facebook at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas This week featuring tracks and remixes from Anzo Bassive Bruno Barudi Christian Falero and Adrian Villaverde HNOIZE John Dahlback and more!

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Silent Bursts
item.description: Sometimes it happens without you even knowing; just the plume of smoke rising. ST and the Club Casualties are ready to loot the late night hours! We have a great mix for you this week bringin some in your face funky electro house. thanks for listening. Remember we have a new mix with new tracks every week (and verrrrrrry rarely repeat tracks, almost never), be sure to get the app for your nokia phone (in europe and asia) from www.ovi.com 's app store (Search Spencer Thomas) and you can also subscribe through itunes and zune. This week featuring tracks and remixes from Bad Boy Bill, Steve Smooth and Kalendr Morgan Page, Lazy Rich Revolvr, Charles Deluxe Dada Life, Moonflower Hollidayrain Custom Drops and more Have a good one, rock it out right.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...It's You or Me...
item.description: Choose your weapon. Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties are back with the weekly installment you've been waiting for. Funked, grooved and electrified, we bring you around town and more in this weeks mix. Feauturing tracks and remixes from Dylan Kennedy and Defunct! Holy Shit! Patron and Atomic Drop Chrizz Luvly Feed Me Dj Fei Long and utku S and Wiley Webb Dont forget you can subscribe to this podcast on Itunes, Zune the www.ovi.com app store (search "spencer thomas") and check out spencer thomas at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas . Thanks for listening and rock it out right.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Run Baby Run
item.description: Ready? lets get goin. No use in waiting, just go. Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties are back with 2012's first episode. Just like your day to day, this mix has got the ups and downs, providing the soundtrack for your day. Featuring tracks and remixes from Dilemn, Noisy Freaks Deadmau5, Billie Newton Davis Miles Dyson, Jerique Thrill Me Croucheron Alex Mind, Darth, Vader ZXX and more Be sure to subscribe on Itunes, Zune or the FREE nokia app from www.ovi.com, search "spencer thomas" . You can also check out spencer thomas at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas .

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...The Revolution, Join Us...
item.description: The years almost over,have you chosen what side you're on yet? Its ok if you havn't but keep us in mind. The Club Casualties are always open to new soldiers. This week we start out with some funky electro house, bring it in hard in the middle and end it as we always do...with some funk. This week featuring tracks and remixes from: The Snipplers John Debo feat Mezo Richard Dinsdale ft Sam Obernik & Hool n Sling Housbrothers remix by Electrocker TV Tock, Dudy with Pascal and Pearce Jared F anad DJ Kue Tune Brothers You can subscribe on itunes, zune, the www.ovi.com spencer thomas podcast app or just download from this site. thanks for your support. feel free to email djspencerthomas@eventvibe.com or contact me through facebook at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas
item.dc:creator: Spencer Thomas
item.itunes:summary:

This week featuring tracks and remixes from: The Snipplers John Debo feat Mezo Richard Dinsdale ft Sam Obernik & Hool n Sling Housbrothers remix by Electrocker TV Tock, Dudy with Pascal and Pearce Jared F anad DJ Kue Tune Brothers
You can subscribe on itunes, zune, the www.ovi.com spencer thomas podcast app or just download from this site. thanks for your support. feel free to email djspencerthomas@eventvibe.com or contact me through facebook at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...The Recruits
item.description: **NOTE TO LISTENERS AND SUBSCRIBERS** The IDMAs are open for nominations... Vote Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties (full names Spencer Thomas: Club Casualties Electro House) for BEST PODCAST #27 ...heres the link http://www.wintermusicconference.com/idmaballot/nomineesballot/ and as always, thanks for listening!! Put in a lil work and you never now how high you can get...ST and the CC are always on the lookout for recuits. This week we get ready for some funk. We hit it hard and dont let up til its over. Featuring tracks and remixes from Michael White Droid Beats Froidz Mord Fustang Dave Darell Fukkk Off Chrizz Luvly and more Be sure to catch spencer thomas at Wild Knight club in Scottsdale, Friday Dec 23rd http://wildknightclub.com/ ...also you can check him out at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas and you can keep up with the podcast thru itunes or the nokia app at www.ovi.com ...just search spencer thomas.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...We Run the Night
item.description: Its always the guys behind the scenes that make the decisions in the back rooms. We just happen to do it in the booth too....ST and the Club Casualties bring you some much needed funk this week to get you through these holidays and we end it with an old school classic. Featuring tracks and remixes from Digital Freq and Pyramyth Under Construction Colombo Fractal System with Split & Jaxta Chris Lake and Lazy Rich Super Beez and Vodge Diper Dont forget to get the app for your nokia phone in the www.ovi.com app store to download ST and the CC directly to your phone, just search Spencer Thomas in the store. Also you can check out what ST is up to on facebook www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas rock it out right.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...It's In the Eyes
item.description: Look into the eyes, whether its a beautiful lady or your arch nemesis. The eyes can tell you what they're thinking and whats about to go down....that's why we wear sunglasses... Spencer T and the Club Casualties bring you in with some electroey goodness this evening. We bring you up, let you get relaxed and then sucker punch you with some funk. This week featuring tracks and remixes from: Avicii (FTAMPA bootleg) Miles Dyson BT Mason Felguk Jaswho Tommie Sunshine and more.. Dont miss out on the app for your nokia phone at the www.ovi.com app store, search spencer thomas podcast and also be sure to check out spencer thomas at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas
item.dc:creator: Spencer Thomas
item.itunes:summary:
Look into the eyes, whether its a beautiful lady or your arch nemesis. The eyes can tell you what they're thinking and whats about to go down....that's why we wear sunglasses... Spencer T and the Club Casualties bring you in with some electroey goodness this evening. We bring you up, let you get relaxed and then sucker punch you with some funk.
This week featuring tracks and remixes from: Avicii (FTAMPA bootleg) Miles Dyson BT Mason Felguk Jaswho Tommie Sunshine and more..
Dont miss out on the app for your nokia phone at the www.ovi.com app store, search spencer thomas podcast and also be sure to check out spencer thomas at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Downsides of the Blast
item.description: Not much to say here, just watch out for how big the charge is, then scatter. ST and the Club Casualties ease you back in it this week and then bring back some electroey funk to make sure you're always in that 'better days' mood. This week featuring tracks and remixes from: Dirty South Cold Blank Dj Chic & Pipe Cruz Alex Menco Morgan Page Re-Fuge and more Dont forget you can subscribe on iTunes, Zune and get the Spencer Thomas podcast app for your nokia phone at www.ovi.com 's app store

Then, its back to the funky electro house you've come to love. Dont forget to get the app for your nokia phone at the www.ovi.com app store and visit www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas for further information. item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Look Past the Blackout

Spencer T and the Club Casualties haul it back in this week with some funky/electro house that'll have your knickers in a twist...Remember...its for the kids...and trust your djs This week featuring tracks and remixes from Hypster Dj Kue Wolfgang Gartner Toby Emerson Jorge Jaramillo Adrian Lux and more...

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...The Inside Nemesis
item.description: A lot can get in the way of a good score...no sense in making anything harder on yourself. Gotta push past that block and go for the gold (or silver, it looks less tacky)...ST and the Club Casualties rocket through the obstacles to bring you another funked up late night set. Featuring some disco/electro house and vocals that'll make your head pieces bob, so be sure to download or stream from here, itunes, zune, the app on the ovi.com app store (free) or any other podcatchers you use... This week featuring tracks and remixes from The Immigrant Lizzie Curious Sharam Dirty Disco Youth Jono Fernandez a and more Dont miss an issue! Be sure to check back weekly to get new mixes of the hottest disco/electro house ST digs up...rock it out right.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties....Usurpers Welcome
item.description: Its a rough crowd these days...gotta keep on those toes, one second everythings kosher, the next your getting sucker punched around a corner. But that's all right; we welcome the challenge and to claim this power itll take a lot. ST and the Club Casualties are here once again with some disco/electro house goodness...be sure to check out www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas , subscribe through itunes, zune and the app at the www.ovi.com app store. Always remember to rock it out right...cuz its for the kids... This week featuring tracks and remixes from Dirtyloud Dada Life Andy B Jones Oliver Tatsch Electrixx and more...

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties....Reunite and Fight
item.description: Takes a diverse crowd to get things done right. You need to get your crew together and pool all the talent...ST and the Club Casualties are back with a mix that'll make your bullocks tingle....we start off hard for those that like it gritty, but with that discoey touch, and we end up with some of ST's favorite tracks at the end...so get ready, download, stream... burn..distribute, do what you gotta do and rock it out right featuring tracks and remixes from Calvin Harris Minero Vodge Diper Sultan, BT and Morgan Page Sabrepulse and more.. be sure to check out spencer thomas @ www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas or download the nokia app for your phone for FREE at www.ovi.com 's app store..just search spencer thomas

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties....Payoffs
item.description: It's a win win situation...you get something you need, we get something we want. Its a civilized game...just take it. ST and the Club Casualties will take care of you on the dance floor all night long. With some funky electro house to some great disco/electro house this mix is a must download...get it here, at the www.ovi.com app store , www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas or stream it on digg, Itunes or Zune! This week featuring Tracks and remixes from Nero Hypster Soulbrothers Aaren San Spencer & Hill Miles Dyson and more rock it out right.

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...Got Some Heat...
item.description: A lil heat never hurt nobody...in fact, keeps you on your toes. Dont worry though,relax, get it outa your mind, ST and the Club Casualties will take care of everything...just keep the party goin. Delving into some goodness we have some of that funky electro house mixed in with a lil filter house for nostalgic purposes (updated stuff though)...So download, stream and subscribe...dont forget if youre overseas get the app at www.ovi.com search Spencer Thomas in the app store and check out ST at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas ... This week featuring tracks and remixes from: Hirshee Tommy Trash Joel Armstrong Harley BioBlitz and more...

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties....BOOM, hit
item.description: When there's a job to do sometimes its just easier to get it over with as quick as possible...light that fuse and leave the worries in the ashes...ST and the Club Casualties are at it again this week with some bass in blowin up in that face...o' yours....the funky electro house you know so well... featuring tracks and remixes from Herve Monolythe Santerna Der Mystik Thomas Gold Dirty Disco Youth Spencer & Hill and more Dont forget to check out spencer thomas at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas , subscribe through itunes and zune and get the app for your nokia phone at www.ovi.com

item.title: Spencer Thomas and the Club Casualties...It's a Raid!!!
item.description: People start pouring in and things get a lil outa hand, sometimes in a good way...no worries though, we can handle anything and the only thing that stops the party is the sunrise...ST and the CC are always here and will always be here with that funk you need. This week is a lil shorter but hits hard, dont forget to check out ST at www.facebook.com/djspencerthomas and subscribe through itunes, zune and get the Nokia app at http://store.ovi.com/search?q=Spencer+Thomas .... This week featuring tracks and remixes from: Hirshee Glamrock Brothers Rocket Pimp BRUK Tony Arzadon and More...
